errors.open_in_tg: Please open this mini app inside Telegram

form.sound_name_hint: Enter a name for your sound. For example: "laugh", "ringtone".
form.category_hint: Choose a category for your sound from the list
faq.title: Copyright Disclaimer
faq.rule_1: You may upload only tracks that are not protected by copyright (public domain, royalty-free, Creative Commons), or those for which you have official permission from the copyright holder.
faq.rule_2: The bot administration is not responsible for any content uploaded by users. Full responsibility lies with the person who uploaded the file.
faq.rule_3: If you are a copyright holder and believe your rights have been violated, please submit a takedown request in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) via Telegram: @let_support
faq.footer: Your request will be reviewed and the infringing content will be removed.
warnings.daily_upload_limit: You have reached the daily upload limit. New files can be added later.
warnings.unauthorized: It looks like you are not authorized. Please sign in.
warnings.sound_not_found: This sound is no longer available or has been removed.
warnings.unknown_error:
Oops...
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
